title: i
clause_text: i.e. owners share of land. If OA/POS/AH to be handed over to MCGM is not abutting the municipal road, the same shall be provided with uninterrupted access as per table no 7 of Regulation No 23(1).The area of the land after deduction of the area covered under road/uninterrupted access proposed as above, shall be apportioned among Ownerâ€™s Share, AH, POS, and OA as detailed below. These roads/uninterrupted access shall be handed over to MCGM and will be eligible for additional BUA equal to area of land surrendered/transferred over and above FSI as stipulated below in Sr. No. D
